subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] 'nother "hits the earth" [1 Attachment]
author: Tim Woolworth
full_text:
It's weird how many of these messages you get.  The only reason I question
them is that they keep changes the month on you, but it always seems to be
between may-august in their messages.

The solar system is exceedingly active this month, way more so than usual.
 On October 8 - 10 - 12- 13 - 14 - 16 - 17 there are asteroids that are real
close to Earths orbit, and on October 20th, Comet Hartley 2 will be about 45
times the Earth-Moon distance from the Earth (or about 17.7 million
kilometers).  Which is pretty close in space distance.

Tim

On Wed, Oct 13, 2010 at 6:05 PM, Frank Sumption

>
>  F-S
